code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) participant S as Switch
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) participant B as Computadora B
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) participant C as Computadora C
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) participant D as Computadora D
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
Destino: Broadcast (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) S->>C: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) S->>D: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: A (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
license_name: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International
repo_description: Material en abierto para la asignatura Juegos en Red del Grado en Videojuegos de la URJC
